title: Rahu Transit in the 8th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting your eighth house triggers deep transformation, hidden fears, and intense curiosity about the unknown. Sudden changes around shared resources, intimacy, or psychological patterns may arise. This phase heightens interest in research, secrets, and taboo subjects, but can also amplify anxiety if control is forced. Financial matters tied to others require transparency. When approached with awareness, Rahu here accelerates inner evolution and sharpens crisis-handling abilities.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Emotional intensity increases beneath the surface.
Desire to control uncertainty may rise.

sections.heading: Career
points: Research, investigation, or analytics gain focus.
Progress comes through depth, not visibility.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Sudden expenses or gains are possible.

closing: Rahu here forces transformation. Facing uncertainty with clarity turns fear into lasting inner power.
